name: Loan Payment Calculator
description:
As a example I use simple
calculation depends on: currency, loan amount
, annual interest rate, number of months
,initial deposit, extra fees, balloon payment at the end
,loan start date

steps.name: Refresh browser
I navigate to home page
I click on LOAN PAYOFF CALCULATOR tab
I select CURRENCY  with "Dollar"
I fill in  LOAN BALANCE with "100"
I fill in  ANNUAL INTEREST RATE with "12"
I fill in AMOUNT YOU ARE PAYING with "5"
I click  on Calculate button
Calculation results form should should be visible
